overview: Dominica has been a Gypsy all of her life. Robbing, cheating, and whoring have been all she's known, but now she wants out. Not wanting to leave her partner Kurt Lockwood in the lurch, she suggests that he pair up with her cousin. Chloe. Kurt goes to the strip club where Chloe works and after seeing her skill at seduction and deception, he's sure it's going to prove to be a VERY profitable partnership.
title: Gypsy Woman
